description: three beds with figures in a room: figure in bed on left side is sitting up; figure in bed in the foreground faces the viewer with their head resting in the palm of their hand; figure in bed on the right side at the back of the room lies prone; room is colored in a blue wash; bedspreads on each bed are colored in pink
inscription: LRC of sheet, in pencil: 23 / E.89 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1998
title: Night Scene
